doc.after: The general appearance of the Beagle resembles a miniature Foxhound, but the head is broader and the muzzle shorter, the expression completely different and the legs shorter in proportion to the body.[28] They are generally between 13 and 16 inches (33 and 41Â cm) high at the withers and weigh between 18 and 35Â lb (8.2 and 15.9Â kg), with females being slightly smaller than males on average.[29]
